Sentencas: Electrolyte-cathode interfaces are critical regions of solid oxide fuel cells where important degradation phe-nomena are localized due to cation interdiffusion and reactivity.
Titulo: Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years

Sentencas: State-of-the-art barrier layers deposited by screen-printing are not fully blocking, resulting in the formation of insulating phases such as SrZrO3.
Titulo: Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years

Sentencas: This article is the continuation of a previous work where a dense gadolinium doped ceria (CGO) barrier layer deposited by pulsed laser deposition (PLD) was optimized and deposited on large-area cells (80 cm2) (Morales et al., 2018)
Titulo: Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years
Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years

Sentencas: Those cells, together with reference cells made with CGO screen-printed barrier layers were operated in the same stack for 14000 h during two years.
Titulo: Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years

Sentencas: In this work, advanced post-mortem characterisation of the cells is presented showing important microstructural differences between the two types of cell.
Titulo: Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years

Sentencas: Operated reference cells present formation of SrZrO3 and cathode demixing, as observed in previous works.
Titulo: Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years

Sentencas: Moreover, the generation of a fracture parallel to the barrier layer inside the electrolyte is reported, which is compatible with the coalescence of Kirkendall voids formed at the diffusion front of the Gd/Ce cations into the electrolyte.
Titulo: Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years

Sentencas: In contrast, the PLD barrier layer remains stable, avoids the formation of insulating phases and prevents the formation of the mentioned fracture.
Titulo: Enhanced diffusion barrier layers for avoiding degradation in SOFCs aged for 14000 h during 2 years
